item.description:
Hi! It's the first Friday of the month and I wanted to let everyone know that I will be playing during happy hour at the Alfa's Pizza and Pub on Friday, April 19th from 9:00 PM to 12:00 - 12:30 AM or so. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd - and it's terrific to make new friends, too! If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated. As this is a public venue, feel free to bring friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

Please note that this a loosely organized, informal gathering. 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom is a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed at a a number of venues, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT Alfa's Pizza and Pub: Tucked away, near Walnut Beach and across from newly developed housing, is Alfa's Pizza & Pub. This is where the locals go to relax with a beer and a slice. The menu features all the usual Italian specialties, along with American favorites such as, hot dogs. The restaurant and bar are two separate rooms in the same building - accessible to each other through an open archway. There's more information at: http://milford.patch.com/listings/alfas-pizza-pub  AND http://www.yelp.com/biz/alfa-pizza-milford.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Debut Performace at Alfa's
